TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DSASignatureFormatter extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter

Docs.summary: Creates a Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA">) signature.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter"> class.

Docs.param: The instance of the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA">) that holds the key.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance unsigned int8[] CreateSignature(unsigned int8[] rgbHash) cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA">) PKCS #1 signature for the specified data.
Docs.returns: The digital signature for the specified data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The resulting signature data can be verified by using <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
## Examples [!CODE [System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter#1)]

Docs.param: The name of the hash algorithm to use for the signature formatter.
Docs.summary: Specifies the hash algorithm for the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA">) signature formatter.
